<p><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>Social Worker L2 – Worcester City Area</strong></span><br />£25,481 to £28,672<br /> 37 hours per week.</p>
<p>Are you an enthusiastic and dynamic Social Worker and want to join a dedicated and very supportive team in the delivery of Adult Social Care across either the Worcester City Area.<br /> If so, we are looking to recruit qualified L2 Social Workers to join us in the Worcester City Area Social Work Team<br /><br /> You will need to have the confidence to advocate for our clients and work in partnership with health colleagues other statutory partners and voluntary sector providers.  As a practitioner you will need to have the ability to be creative, innovative and search for solutions that are not always obvious.<br /><br /> Managing your own work and caseload includes the ability to approve and purchase support packages and stick with people until you are confident that you have managed to make some positive changes in their life.<br /><br /> The team are very friendly and supportive of each other. We meet regularly as a team to discuss clients, explore areas of practice and offer 1:1 supervision monthly.<br /><br /> If you would like to find out more about these positions please contact:<br /> Michelle Hewitt – Worcester City Area Manager - 01905 844762</p>
title: Social Worker L2
